aria-label.description:
The static string to use used for `aria-label`
if no visible label is used.
aria-label.description_zh:
用于 'aria-label' 的静态字符串
如果未使用可见标签。

aria-labelledby.description:
The static string `aria-labelledby` that points to the
ID of the element that serves as label for the slider
aria-labelledby.description_zh:
指向
用作滑块标签的元素的 ID

aria-valuetext.description: The static string to use used for `aria-valuetext`
aria-valuetext.description_zh: 用于 'aria-valuetext' 的静态字符串

defaultValue.description: The initial value of the slider in uncontrolled mode
defaultValue.description_zh: 非受控模式下滑块的初始值

focusThumbOnChange.description: If `false`, the slider handle will not capture focus when value changes.
focusThumbOnChange.description_zh: 如果为 'false'，则当值更改时，滑块手柄将不会捕获焦点。

getAriaValueText.description:
Function that returns the `aria-valuetext` for screen readers.
It is mostly used to generate a more human-readable
representation of the value for assistive technologies
getAriaValueText.description_zh:
为屏幕阅读器返回 'aria-valuetext' 的函数。
它主要用于生成更易读的
辅助技术价值的表示

id.description: The base `id` to use for the slider and its components
id.description_zh: 用于滑块及其组件的基本 'id'

isDisabled.description: If `true`, the slider will be disabled
isDisabled.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则滑块将被禁用

isReadOnly.description: If `true`, the slider will be in `read-only` state
isReadOnly.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则滑块将处于 'read-only' 状态

isReversed.description: If `true`, the value will be incremented or decremented in reverse.
isReversed.description_zh: 如果为 'true'，则该值将反向递增或递减。

max.description: The maximum allowed value of the slider. Cannot be less than min.
max.description_zh: 滑块允许的最大值。不能小于 min。

min.description: The minimum allowed value of the slider. Cannot be greater than max.
min.description_zh: 滑块允许的最小值。不能大于 max。

minStepsBetweenThumbs.description:
The minimum distance between slider thumbs. Useful for preventing
the thumbs from being too close together.
minStepsBetweenThumbs.description_zh:
滑块块之间的最小距离。有助于预防
拇指靠得太近。

name.description:
The name attribute of the hidden `input` field.
This is particularly useful in forms
name.description_zh:
隐藏的 'input' 字段的 name 属性。
这在表单中特别有用

onChange.description: Function called whenever the slider value changes  (by dragging or clicking)
onChange.description_zh: 每当滑块值发生变化时调用的函数（通过拖动或单击）

onChangeEnd.description: Function called when the user is done selecting a new value (by dragging or clicking)
onChangeEnd.description_zh: 当用户完成选择新值（通过拖动或单击）时调用的函数

onChangeStart.description: Function called when the user starts selecting a new value (by dragging or clicking)
onChangeStart.description_zh: 当用户开始选择新值时调用的函数（通过拖动或单击）

step.description: The step in which increments/decrements have to be made
step.description_zh: 必须进行递增/递减的步骤

value.description: The value of the slider in controlled mode
